title: Technical Roadmap
description: Our technical roadmap outlines the planned improvements, features, and milestones for Builder Vancouver's platform and community initiatives.
overview: This roadmap represents our commitment to building a world-class platform for the Bitcoin builder community. We're focused on improving user experience, expanding educational resources, and creating tools that empower builders to create innovative Bitcoin applications.

milestones.title: Q1 2024 - Foundation & Infrastructure
milestones.description: Establishing core infrastructure and foundational features for the platform.

items.title: Structured Content Management System
items.description: Implement JSON-based content management system with Zod schema validation for type-safe content editing.

items.title: SEO & Structured Data
items.description: Implement comprehensive SEO optimization with Schema.org structured data (JSON-LD) for better search visibility.

items.title: Responsive Design System
items.description: Ensure all pages are fully responsive and accessible across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

milestones.title: Q2 2024 - Community Features
milestones.description: Enhancing community engagement and member interaction features.

items.title: Enhanced Member Profiles
items.description: Expand member profile pages with project showcases, skill tags, and contribution history.

items.title: Event Registration System
items.description: Build integrated event registration and RSVP system with capacity management.

items.title: Discussion Forums
items.description: Create community discussion forums for technical topics, project collaboration, and Q&A.

milestones.title: Q3 2024 - Developer Tools
milestones.description: Building tools and resources to support Bitcoin developers and builders.

items.title: Public API & Documentation
items.description: Develop public API for accessing event data, presentations, and resources with comprehensive documentation.

items.title: Code Example Library
items.description: Create searchable library of Bitcoin and Lightning Network code examples and tutorials.

items.title: Testing & Development Tools
items.description: Provide local development environment setup guides and testing utilities for Bitcoin applications.

milestones.title: Q4 2024 - Advanced Features
milestones.description: Implementing advanced features and integrations to enhance the platform.

items.title: Lightning Network Integration
items.description: Integrate Lightning Network payments for event tickets, sponsorships, and community contributions.

items.title: Nostr Integration
items.description: Add Nostr protocol support for decentralized social features and event announcements.

items.title: Community Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Build analytics dashboard showing community growth, event attendance trends, and engagement metrics.

milestones.title: 2025 - Platform Expansion
milestones.description: Expanding the platform to support multiple cities and international communities.

items.title: Multi-City Platform Support
items.description: Extend platform to support multiple Builder cities with city-specific content and event management.

items.title: Internationalization (i18n)
items.description: Add multi-language support for international Builder communities.

items.title: Mobile Application
items.description: Develop native mobile applications for iOS and Android to improve accessibility.
